section.title: Distribution for z/OS overview
section.para: This is a distribution of all LegStar z/OS modules in TSO XMIT format.

Although the main LegStar distribution contains all the z/OS modules as source code and sample compilation JCL, it might be tricky to figure out in what precise order these compilation jobs should run. In addition, the main distribution does not include JCL for CICS RDO definitions.

As a convenience, this distribution groups all z/OS modules both in executable and source format in a set of TSO XMIT files. This way, you can install the executables directly without any compilation. Furthermore a JCL with RDO definitions is provided.
For instructions on how to install this distribution follow this link.
